item.description:
Come join us on a Sunny (we hope) Sunday Afternoon for a Catamaran ride upon the 9th Wave in Newburyport.

UPDATE: Hey everyone I wanted to let you know that there has been a little change to this event, and we are sorry for the misunderstanding.

Please call in to hold your spot BY AUGUST 5TH. I know most of you may be waiting for the last minute because of the weather or maybe another reason. But please try to call in to reserve your spot by Wednesday at the latest. When you have can you please put on this site that you have called in your spot, so we can also get an actual count of who's coming. Unfortunately we will not be able to get the discount at this time, and they will be charging your card as early as 8/5.

Again sorry for the change in plans, we are still hoping that you will be joining us it should be a great day and let's get out on the beautiful water and enjoy the day!


Experience the comfort and excitement of sailing aboard the river's only commercial sailing catamaran. Take the helm if you wish! The Ninth Wave sails out of the Merrimack River. We are docked at the far west end of the Newburyport waterfront boardwalk.

Our voyage:

All of our tours include a cruise of the Newburyport waterfront after which we will leave the harbor and raise sails in the open ocean, heading north or south along the coast as the wind dictates. We encourage our passengers to take an active role in the handling of the boat: raise the main, trim the sails or take the helm under the tutelage of our experienced captain and crew, while learning about the region's colorful past and looking at the natural history of our rich marine environment. Please understand that sail times are approximate because we cannot control the conditions and sailing is not an exact science.

Ticket cost is: **$31.00 (please see below there will be a discount given to the amount of tickets that are
sold to our group)

Things you need to know about this meetup:

----Don't hesitate to call in a reservation, the boat is not reserved just for our group so it will fill up fast.
----When calling in your reservation, tell them you are reserving a spot on "Donna meetup". Once all reservations are made a discount will be applied depending on how many we have in our group.
----Lunch or Snacks can be brought on the boat, but please be careful not to bring anything that will fly off the boat. NO ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES CAN BE BROUGHT ON THE BOAT, there will be a Cash Bar available.

---Phone # to call to make your reservation is: 866-984-9283

**Call in your reservation with a Credit Card, charges will not be applied until the day before and the discount will be applied at that time. If this event gets cancelled by the 9th Wave, money will be refunded.

So gather up your Friends and Family and join us on this Cruise...The more attendees we have the better the discount will be, but remember reserve soon.

Kids are welcome to attend, kids under 3 are Free.

Sailing time is 2:30pm-5:00pm

* Please Note: As the boat is in the water there is no official address, I have posted the closest address which is the Black Cow Restaurant, there is a parking lot in front of the Black Cow and the 9th Wave is on the west end of the dock. We will update the site as it gets closer for Parking options.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet on the dock in front of the 9th wave
item.name: 9th Wave Catamaran Cruise
